title: Episode 299: The Rights of the Dead
itunes:title: Episode 299: The Rights of the Dead
description:
Do the dead have rights? This Halloween, philosopher James Stacey Taylor joins us for a live (heh) recording of Words & Numbers to take this question seriously.

 

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!

http://www.cooperationandcoercion.com

http://www.wordsandnumbers.org
